headline: Government AI Ethics Platform
overview: Built a comprehensive AI ethics compliance platform for government agencies, streamlining the review process and ensuring responsible AI deployment across 15 federal departments.
buildNotes: Secure multi-tenant architecture with agency isolation
Advanced audit trails and reporting systems

body.raw:
# Responsible AI for Government

Government agencies need robust frameworks for ethical AI deployment. This platform provides comprehensive tools for evaluating, monitoring, and ensuring compliance with federal AI ethics standards.
